description: Text transform on cells in column dc:language using expression grel:forEach(value.split('␞'),v,v.replace(/^deu$/,'ger')).join('␞')

Text transform on cells in column dc:coverage/xml:lang using expression grel:forEach(value.split('␞'),v,v.replace(/^de$/,'ger').replace(/^en$/,'eng').replace(/^es$/,'spa').replace(/^fr$/,'fre').replace(/^it$/,'ita').replace(/^sk$/,'slo')).join('␞')

Text transform on cells in column dc:description/xml:lang using expression grel:forEach(value.split('␞'),v,v.replace(/^de$/,'ger').replace(/^en$/,'eng').replace(/^es$/,'spa').replace(/^fr$/,'fre').replace(/^it$/,'ita').replace(/^sk$/,'slo')).join('␞')
